bio:
Nicholas Sanchez is an Associate Fellow in NYU Shanghai's Interactive Media Arts department. He is a recent graduate from NYU Shanghai, and holds a Bachelors of Science.

Research interests include DIY electronics, digital fabrication, micro controllers, and robotics. While he has studied these subjects throughout his academic career, further areas of interest include the development and proliferation of local maker spaces around the globe.

Languages

  • English (Native Speaker)
  • Chinese (Intermediate)
